page.title: 13 OTHER ESSENTIAL WORKERS
page.content: In town,{refuse workers}collect our {rubbish}twice a week but only once a week in rural areas.The town round takes 3.5 days using 2 lorries which each collect 60 tons.The largest item the lorry machinery can compress is half a mini car.The refuse is buried in pits at Bude and Tintagel.A local {surveyor}told us that interesting work is planning to renovate old buildings. He also values property,auctions goods and deals with the sale and renting of property.His most difficult work is issuing distress warrants to people who are bankrupt and having their belongings removed.A local{garage {proprietor}on a busy route from North Conwall,sells 3000000 litres of{petrol a year and has a tank for{diesel.}On an average,he sells 1 car a day.They also service and repair cars,sell spares and carry out{MOT tests.
